DATAFIELD.name: title
DATAFIELD.selector: #content > DIV.boardWrap > DIV.tbl_area > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-of-type(01) > TD:nth-of-type(2) > A > SPAN

DATAFIELD.name: link
DATAFIELD.selector: #content > DIV.boardWrap > DIV.tbl_area > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-of-type(01) > TD:nth-of-type(2) > A > SPAN

DATAFIELD.name: department
DATAFIELD.selector: #content > DIV.boardWrap > DIV.tbl_area > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-of-type(01) > TD:nth-of-type(3)

DATAFIELD.name: views
DATAFIELD.selector: #content > DIV.boardWrap > DIV.tbl_area > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-of-type(01) > TD:nth-of-type(6)

DATAFIELD.name: registered_date
DATAFIELD.selector: #content > DIV.boardWrap > DIV.tbl_area > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-of-type(01) > TD:nth-of-type(4)

DATAFIELD.name: city
DATAFIELD.selector: #content > DIV.boardWrap > DIV.tbl_area > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-of-type(01) > TD:nth-of-type(2) > A > SPAN
DATAFIELD.heading: 경상북도울릉군

DATAFIELD.name: organization
DATAFIELD.selector: #content > DIV.boardWrap > DIV.tbl_area > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-of-type(01) > TD:nth-of-type(2) > A > SPAN
DATAFIELD.heading: 울릉군관광문화

DATAFIELD.name: deadline
DATAFIELD.selector: #content > DIV.boardWrap > DIV.tbl_area > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-of-type(01) > TD:nth-of-type(2) > A > SPAN

DATAFIELD.name: scrapped_date
DATAFIELD.selector: #content > DIV.boardWrap > DIV.tbl_area > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-of-type(01) > TD:nth-of-type(2) > A > SPAN

DATAFIELD.name: 민간관광안내소 모집 공고
DATAFIELD.selector: #content > DIV.boardWrap > DIV.tbl_area > TABLE > TBODY > TR:nth-of-type(02) > TD:nth-of-type(2) > A > SPAN

DATAFIELD.name: file_name
DATAFIELD.selector: #frm > DIV.boardView > DL > DD:nth-of-type(2) > UL > LI > P > A:nth-of-type(1)

DATAFIELD.name: file_download_link
DATAFIELD.selector: #frm > DIV.boardView > DL > DD:nth-of-type(2) > UL > LI > P > A:nth-of-type(1)

DATAFIELD.name: file_view
DATAFIELD.selector: #frm > DIV.boardView > DL > DD:nth-of-type(2) > UL > LI > P > A:nth-of-type(2)
